What Is A Chair For Kneeling?



To use a kneeling chair, you, you guessed it, kneel rather than sit. To reach its eponymous posture, the user leans forward on an inclined seat and rests their shins on two cushions. For long periods, "any position seems inappropriate, even the kneeling posture," explains Norwegian design company Peter Opsvik, developer of either the kneeling chair, through an interview on Pure Contemporary.
